name: The Awakening (itch) (Awakeners)
description:
The future begins right here and now, everything is in our hands. Stop
waiting for happiness, for lady-luck to shine on you. If you want a
brighter future - make it happen yourself!
Awaken your sleepy fellow citizens, inspire them to action. Don't forget to drive away the terrible monsters!

Game Design, Sound Design - Lev Zhbakov

Game Design - Artyom Armashov

Characters concept, Art, Animation - Ekaterina Kharlamova

Developer, Music, Animation - Alexander Sheboltaev
